TopicTitle: My new "Roleplay-ey" KSP Save with first launch!

Articles.Content:
So, I love doing realistic space programs taking baby steps with suborbital flights and then orbits, etc. So, since I'm too much of a lazy whiner to commit to career or.. even science mode.... I did sandbox! So here is my first unmanned flight, in the Dawn program.

While embedding would be more convenient, it doesn't work well in my opinion. It's not very clean, and the pictures are small, so I'm just going to link it. Sorry if it's annoying!

[http://imgur.com/a/JlTlt](http://imgur.com/a/JlTlt)

Thank you for viewing!

-Slab

Excellent photos! Were you using that one onboard camera mod to take those shots? Otherwise... Your mission looks eerily similar to a work I did, oh, maybe more than a year ago... I took photos in literally almost the same way that you did! Awesome!

Haha, no. No mods except Kerbal Engineer, I just lined the camera up with the fuselage for roleplay's-sake. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Thanks for viewing!

Absolutely! I'll try and link to the project I did. I look forward to seeing your progress!

Edit: [Here it is](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88686-AstroTek-Space-Agency-Mission-Log) ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) July 29, 2014- Yup, almost a year ago.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T16:58:23Z" title="05/25/2015 04:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by Maximus97**
Wow, that's really cool! I wish I had the commitment to do something that involved.

Heh... Too bad I ended up stopping it. Although... Now that I think about it, maybe it's time for a reboot... Honestly until I saw your thread I forgot all about it. I'll see about doing something with it, thanks a million!
That's awesome, I'd love to see more!
